name: jscs2doc
description: Convert .jscsrc (javascript code-style configuration) to a human readable format

scripts.update: npm run update-parser && npm run build
scripts.release: npm run build && git add dist/* && (git commit -m 'feat(dist)' || true)
scripts.test: npm run build && cd examples/ && ../bin/jscs2doc -O output.html
scripts.build: babel src --presets es2015  --plugins add-module-exports --plugins transform-es2015-modules-commonjs -d dist && cp src/*.css dist/

author: Francois-Guillaume Ribreau <npm@fgribreau.com> (http://fgribreau.com/)
